org.xchain.framework.sax.SaxTemplates

    Package Description
    org.xchain.framework.factory
    Provides factory classes for Catalogs and Templates objects.
    org.xchain.framework.lifecycle
    Provides classes that execute the XChain lifecycle.
    org.xchain.framework.sax  
    org.xchain.framework.strategy  

    • Uses of SaxTemplates in org.xchain.framework.factory

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SaxTemplates TemplatesFactory.getTemplates(java.lang.String systemId)
      Loads a templates object from a standard stream source.
      SaxTemplates TemplatesFactory.getTemplates(java.lang.String systemId, SourceStrategy<org.xml.sax.InputSource> sourceStrategy, TemplatesConsumerStrategy consumerStrategy)
      Retrieve the Templates for the given systemId.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SaxTemplates XmlFactoryLifecycle.newTemplates(java.lang.String systemId)
      Returns a new Templates object for the specified systemId.

    • Uses of SaxTemplates in org.xchain.framework.sax

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SaxTemplates XChainTemplatesHandler.getTemplates()
      Returns a non-reloading SaxTemplates object for the stream of sax events that were passed to this handler.
